What’s this?

Fuzzy Logic is the personal website of Laurence Hughes, a web developer at Greenhill and producer in The Nuclear Family.

If you’re interested, read more about me.

My Other Haunts

You’ll find me on Facebook, tweeting on Twitter; posting photos on Instagram; on Soundcloud sharing my tracks and DJ mixes; collecting, buying and selling records on Discogs; and coding on Github and CodePen.

You can also email me.
